title: Mobile Learning-Based Language Proficiency Enhancement Simulation Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Device Usage Skills and Intermediate Language Proficiency
context.additional_context: Providing situational language learning modules for application in workplace environments

learning_goals: Learners can improve real-world responsiveness by over 80% through weekly participation in language-interactive task simulations using mobile devices
Acquire and apply over 15 intermediate-level language expressions considering cultural contexts through VR-based multinational team collaboration scenarios

Learners will analyze two weeks of language learning data (e.g., vocabulary test results, pronunciation scores) collected via personal BYOD devices (smartphones/tablets). They will generate a weekly personalized feedback report (including 3 learning strengths/weaknesses and 2 improvement strategies) and incorporate it into the next week’s learning plan.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
